common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get basic information about the live streaming room, including cover, title, description, type (test live or normal live), create time, update time, stream url, etc. (Only for TW, ID, TH)

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The session(session_id:{{sid}}) is not belong to you

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: The API is not supported for current region

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Too many requests, please try again later

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The identifier of livestream session.

","name":"session_id","sample":"6236215","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"FnrrZfZ"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"MeAYCf"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xHTMTYd"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f3360690a5b55f0689f8a4e801","type":"string","required":null,"key":"yPcFhHb"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"DkfKPQb","children":[{"description":"

The identifier of livestream session.

","name":"session_id","sample":"6236215","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"JxatTn"},{"description":"

The title of the livestream session.

","name":"title","sample":"test title","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KNceaQw"},{"description":"

The description of the livestream session.

","name":"description","sample":"test description","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YMATGJF"},{"description":"

The cover image URL of the livestream session.

","name":"cover_image_url","sample":"https://cf.shopee.sg/file/id-11134104-7r98o-m9y7ly25ngg927","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XXNpZk"},{"description":"

The status of the livestream session, the enumeration values are as follows:

0 - Initial

1 - Ongoing

2 - Ended

","name":"status","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"kdaQPf"},{"description":"

The share link of the livestream session.

","name":"share_url","sample":"https://live.test.shopee.co.id/share?from=live&session=6905656","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xsMnHyT"},{"description":"

Indicate whether this livestream session if for testing purpose only.

","name":"is_test","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"BrxHdJA"},{"description":"

The creation time of the livestream session. It's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"create_time","sample":"1747651742003","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"EfdTCm"},{"description":"

The update time of the livestream session. It's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1747651742003","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"jhpMfYs"},{"description":"

The start time of the livestream session, 0 if session is not started yet. It's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"start_time","sample":"1747651742003","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"yWwjnkY"},{"description":"

The end time of livestream session, 0 if session is not ended yet. It's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"end_time","sample":"1747651742003","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TpneRfk"},{"description":"","name":"stream_url_list","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"TxpQhRb","children":[{"description":"

The push stream url for the livestream session.

","name":"push_url","sample":"rtmp://push-zl.lvb.test.shopee.co.id/live","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iPdYdsc"},{"description":"

The push stream key for the livestream session.

","name":"push_key","sample":"id-test-1987885338002432-6905656?zlSecret=61ef843a6d8e48357ac3d94db52447bf&zlTime=682FF4B1&pushDomain=push-zl.lvb.test.shopee.co.id&cdnID=ZENLAYER&session_id=6905656","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YwxRXiz"},{"description":"

The pull stream url of the livestream session.
